TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CalendarSelectionMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the date selection mode of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode> enumeration represents the date selection modes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
## Examples <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-csharp[CalendarSelectionMode2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarSelectionMode2/CS/calendarselectionmodecs.aspx#1)] --> <!-- TODO: review snippet reference [!code-vb[CalendarSelectionMode2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarSelectionMode2/VB/calendarselectionmodevb.aspx#1)] -->

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode Day = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A single date can be selected on the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode DayWeek = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A single date or entire week can be selected on the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode DayWeekMonth = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A single date, week, or entire month can be selected on the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: No dates can be selected on the control.
